data.snapshot: Ethereum's price has increased by 3.52% to $4,491.67, showing signs of a potential reversal despite lower highs.
technicalReadout: RSI is at 28.59, indicating potential oversold conditions.
Last SMA (8) is $4,516.25, suggesting short-term resistance.
Last SMA (21) is $4,582.64, indicating longer-term resistance.

scenarios.title: Bullish Reversal
scenarios.text: If Ethereum breaks above the last SMA (8) of $4,516.25, a bullish reversal could be confirmed.

scenarios.title: Continued Downtrend
scenarios.text: Should prices decline below $4,284.94, the downtrend may continue with potential for further drops.

scenarios.title: Sideways Movement
scenarios.text: If the price stabilizes around current levels, Ethereum may experience a period of consolidation.

checklist: For demand zone longs: wait for a bullish reaction candle + above‑average buy volume; stop under sweep low.
For structured shorts: wait for a retest of resistance that fails and shows rejection volume; reduce size into expiries.
If price closes daily above key resistance with volume, reconsider bearish sizing.
Keep position sizing modest — the structure is still corrective and volatile.
